examples: The store sometimes offers discounts on certain items.
He put the fragile items in a padded box for protection.
I buy groceries and household items at the supermarket every week.
The shirt has a pocket on the chest for small items.
The police apprehended the thief and recovered the stolen items.
words.defineEn: a single thing or object, especially one that is part of a list, set, or collection
words.defineVi: một thứ hoặc đối tượng, đặc biệt là một thứ là một phần của danh sách, tập hợp hoặc bộ sưu tập

examples: His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
She achieved great success at a young age.
The team's success is built on the meat and potatoes of hard work and dedication.
The success of the project is in your hands.
Success has many fathers, failure is an orphan, indeed.
words.defineEn: the fact of reaching or achieving what one tried for or desired
words.defineVi: thực tế đạt được hoặc đạt được những gì một người đã cố gắng hoặc mong muốn

examples: My sister has a job at a restaurant as a waitress.

My sister has a girl crush on Billie Eilish.
My sister packed some Spanish limes in her picnic basket for a tangy snack on our outdoor adventure.
He loved his sister dearly.
words.defineEn: a lady who shares a mother and father with us
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ chia sẻ một người mẹ và cha với chúng tôi

examples: Her brother is the bane of her life.

My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
My brother taught me the best way to cook spuds over the campfire.
She has one brother and two sisters.
words.defineEn: a man who shares a mother and father with us
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông chia sẻ một người mẹ và cha với chúng tôi

examples: She knows engines backwards.
Start the engines!
Could you run the engine for a moment?
The truck's engine roared as it climbed the steep hill.
The engine spluttered and died.
words.defineEn: the part of a vehicle that uses a particular fuel to make the vehicle move
words.defineVi: một phần của một chiếc xe sử dụng một loại nhiên liệu cụ thể để làm cho chiếc xe di chuyển

examples: The restaurant featured a signature dish of slow-roasted brisket.

The farm-to-table restaurant featured a signature dish of picnic shoulder with creamy sauce.
The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
words.defineEn: an important or distinctive aspect of something
words.defineVi: một khía cạnh quan trọng hoặc đặc biệt của một cái gì đó

examples: The squash player killed the ball with a nick.
The umpire gave the ball out.
He killed the ball.
He passed the ball to Sterling.
Everyone had a ball at the party.
words.defineEn: a round object that is used as a toy or in games and sports, such as soccer, basketball, bowling, etc.
words.defineVi: một vật tròn được sử dụng làm đồ chơi hoặc trong các trò chơi và thể thao, chẳng hạn như bóng đá, bóng rổ, bowling, v.v.

examples: A large cardboard box will serve the purpose.
These experiments serve no useful purpose.
The purpose is to build new houses for local people.
The revised edition is to all intents and purposes a new book.
The main purpose of industry is to create wealth.
words.defineEn: a desired outcome that guides one's plans or actions
words.defineVi: một kết quả mong muốn hướng dẫn các kế hoạch hoặc hành động của một người

examples: The business has legs.
The street vendor served flavorful turkey legs.
At a lively seafood restaurant, guests relished succulent crab legs.
She lost a leg in a car crash.
College tuitions cost an arm and leg nowadays.
words.defineEn: each of the two long body parts that we use when we walk
words.defineVi: mỗi trong số hai bộ phận cơ thể dài mà chúng ta sử dụng khi đi bộ

examples: Sleep well and sweet dreams.
The wedding celebrations went like a dream.
Many actors dream of winning prestigious awards for their performances.
A few weeks later, I landed my dream job.
Our dream destination for this year's vacation is a secluded tropical island.
words.defineEn: a series of images, feelings, or events happening in one's mind during sleep
words.defineVi: một loạt hình ảnh, cảm giác hoặc sự kiện xảy ra trong tâm trí của một người trong khi ngủ

examples: His management style ruffled a few feathers.

You'll find this style of architecture all over the town.

We have no truck with that style of gutter journalism.
words.defineEn: the manner in which something takes place or is accomplished
words.defineVi: cách thức mà một cái gì đó diễn ra hoặc được hoàn thành

examples: That detail must have slipped between the cracks.

Give your contact details and follow this with a brief profile of yourself.
The company overlooked a small detail in their contract, and now they're facing a costly lawsuit.

examples: Some NTDs cause blindness as the result of awful eye infections.

my perception of blindness, is that something is missing.

words.defineVi: tình trạng hoặc trạng thái hoàn toàn hoặc một phần không thể nhìn thấy

examples: A lack of investment in education can breed ignorance and apathy in a society.

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.

I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
words.defineEn: a condition or situation in which something is necessary
words.defineVi: một điều kiện hoặc tình huống trong đó một cái gì đó là cần thiết

examples: The three brothers took stock of the warehouse.

words.defineVi: các mặt hàng có sẵn để bán trong một cửa hàng hoặc nhà kho của nó

examples: While in hospital, Jeremy took stock of his life.
It took a while, but I've finally found my feet in my job.

Elon Musk walked the walk for the first time in a while.

words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian

examples: Art serves an important function in our society.
The repairman fixed the faulty wiring, and now the electrical system in the house was functioning as right as rain.
I can't even function in the morning until I've had my first cup of joe.
The gentlemen's agreement was never intended to apply to executive functions.

words.defineEn: a particular activity of a person or thing or their purpose
words.defineVi: một hoạt động cụ thể của một người hoặc vật hoặc mục đích của họ

examples: The actress was practicing her lines before the audition.
They practice their soccer skills every day after school.
She sometimes practices yoga in the morning.

examples: The road follows the track of the railway line.

The road led away from the house directly to the lake.

examples: Turn the heat down.

Cathy was really feeling the heat.
The radiation from the sun provides heat and light to sustain life on Earth.

words.defineVi: nhiệt độ cao; chất lượng nóng

examples: Ice hockey is a beloved sport in Canada.

well, I took a beating in prison and I kind of lost my hearing, you know.
